game.board.edges

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.board.edges.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the edge of a Hex.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann, Cornelia Sedlmeir-Hofmann
    See Also:
    Hex

      • hasRoadInAdjacentEdges

        public boolean hasRoadInAdjacentEdges(Player player)
        Checks if the player has a road on the adjacent edges of this edge.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player whose roads are checked.
        Returns:
        true if there is a road in the adjacent edges, false otherwise.
